description: This is a fully furnished and standard upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 16-inch, 5.56mm barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a fully furnished and military-specification upper assembly for an AR-15-style carbine with a shortened 14.5-inch, 5.56mm barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a fully furnished and military-specification upper assembly for an AR-15-style carbine with a shortened 10.3-inch, 5.56mm barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a fully furnished upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 16-inch,.300 AAC Blackout barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.  Thanks to the.300 Blackout round's similar overall dimensions to standard 5.56mm ammunition, a converted rifle may still make use of plain STANAG magazines.

This is a fully furnished and shortened upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 10.5-inch,.300 AAC Blackout barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.  Thanks to the.300 Blackout round's similar overall dimensions to standard 5.56mm ammunition, a converted rifle may still make use of plain STANAG magazines.

This is a fully furnished and extremely short upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 7.5-inch,.300 AAC Blackout barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.  Thanks to the.300 Blackout round's similar overall dimensions to standard 5.56mm ammunition, a converted rifle may still make use of plain STANAG magazines.

This is a fully furnished and high-caliber upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with an 18-inch, 12.7x42mm (.50 Beowulf) barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a fully furnished and high-caliber upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 16-inch, 12.7x42mm (.50 Beowulf) barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a fully furnished and high-caliber upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 7.5-inch, 12.7x42mm (.50 Beowulf) barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a number of bundled parts: a forward-ejecting, 20-inch, 5.56x45mm barrel; an appropriate bolt assembly; and a proprietary gas compensator, which, when installed, will convert a Desert Tech MDRX rifle to fire standard .223-caliber ammunition.
//: Stats taken from the ported barrel to provide a compensated effect.

description: This is a number of bundled parts: a forward-ejecting, 16-inch, 5.56x45mm barrel; an appropriate bolt assembly; and a proprietary gas compensator, which, when installed, will convert an MDRX rifle to fire standard .223-caliber ammunition.

This is a number of bundled parts: a forward-ejecting, 11.5-inch, 5.56x45mm barrel; an appropriate bolt assembly; and a proprietary gas compensator, which, when installed, will convert an MDRX rifle to fire standard .223-caliber ammunition.  Given the MDRX’s bullpup configuration, the provided 11.5-inch barrel would barely protrude beyond the lip of the receiver once installed, making the carbine incredibly compact.

This is a number of bundled parts: a forward-ejecting, 16-inch, .300 AAC Blackout barrel; an appropriate bolt assembly; and a proprietary gas compensator, which, when installed, will convert a Desert Tech MDRX rifle to fire .30BLK-caliber ammunition.
//: Stats taken from the ported barrel to provide a compensated effect.

description: This is a number of bundled parts: a forward-ejecting, 20-inch, 7.62x51mm NATO barrel; an appropriate bolt assembly; and a proprietary gas compensator, which, when installed, will convert a Desert Tech MDRX rifle to fire long-range .308-caliber ammunition.
//: Stats taken from the ported barrel to provide a compensated effect.

description: This is a number of bundled parts: a forward-ejecting, 16-inch, 7.62x51mm NATO barrel; an appropriate bolt assembly; and a proprietary gas compensator, which, when installed, will convert a Desert Tech MDRX rifle to fire long-range .308-caliber ammunition.
A larger cradle with a longer sling for fitting to a staff sling to enable it to throw grenades.
